statements: SELECT * FROM LegalCases WHERE case_status = 'Active';
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM LegalCases WHERE case_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT case_description FROM LegalCases WHERE plaintiff_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT case_name, defendant_name FROM LegalCases WHERE case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM LegalCases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM LegalCases WHERE case_status = 'pending';
SELECT case_name, plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM LegalCases WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM LegalCases WHERE case_status = 'resolved' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_cases FROM LegalCases;
SELECT AVG(LENGTH(case_description)) AS avg_description_length FROM LegalCases WHERE case_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, filing_date, court_location FROM legal_cases WHERE outcome = 'Settled';
SELECT case_name, case_description FROM legal_cases WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM lawyers WHERE lawyer_specialization = 'Criminal Defense' ORDER BY lawyer_experience_years DESC;
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialization, lawyer_location FROM lawyers WHERE lawyer_location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE filing_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT case_name, court_location FROM legal_cases WHERE gender_discrimination = TRUE ORDER BY filing_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT outcome FROM legal_cases WHERE court_location = 'New York';
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialization, lawyer_experience_years FROM lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_experience_years DESC;
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_location FROM lawyers WHERE lawyer_specialization = 'Criminal Defense' AND lawyer_location != 'New York';
SELECT * FROM LegalCases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, outcome FROM LegalCases WHERE case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM PartiesInvolved ORDER BY party_name DESC;
SELECT document_type, document_name FROM CaseDocuments WHERE document_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY document_date ASC;
SELECT case_id, case_name, filed_date, outcome FROM LegalCases WHERE filed_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM LegalCases WHERE outcome = 'Pending' ORDER BY filed_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, outcome FROM LegalCases WHERE filed_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY case_name ASC;
SELECT party_name, party_role, party_type FROM PartiesInvolved WHERE party_type = 'Defendant' ORDER BY party_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CaseDocuments WHERE document_type = 'Evidence' ORDER BY document_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, case_type, filed_date FROM LegalCases ORDER BY filed_date ASC, case_name DESC;
SELECT case_title, outcome FROM LegalCases WHERE filing_date >= '2021-01-01'
SELECT plaintiff_name, gender, age FROM Plaintiffs WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY gender ASC, plaintiff_name DESC
SELECT defendant_name FROM Defendants WHERE gender = 'Female' AND defendant_id < 100
SELECT lawyer_id, lawyer_name FROM Lawyers ORDER BY specialization
SELECT * FROM LegalCases JOIN Plaintiffs ON LegalCases.case_id = Plaintiffs.plaintiff_id
SELECT * FROM LegalCases WHERE outcome = 'Settled'
SELECT case_title, filing_date FROM LegalCases WHERE filing_date > '2020-01-01' ORDER BY filing_date DESC

SELECT plaintiff_name, defendant_name, outcome FROM LegalCases INNER JOIN Plaintiffs ON LegalCases.case_id = Plaintiffs.plaintiff_id INNER JOIN Defendants ON LegalCases.case_id = Defendants.defendant_id
SELECT lawyer_name, specialization FROM Lawyers ORDER BY specialization, lawyer_name
SELECT * FROM Plaintiffs WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 50
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_id, case_name, filing_date FROM legal_cases WHERE outcome = 'Settled';
SELECT defendant_name, defendant_role FROM defendants WHERE case_id = 3;
SELECT lawyer_name, specialization FROM lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_name DESC;
SELECT plaintiff_name, plaintiff_gender, plaintiff_age FROM plaintiffs WHERE plaintiff_age > 30 ORDER BY plaintiff_age ASC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_id = 1;
SELECT case_name, filing_date FROM legal_cases WHERE filing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT plaintiff_name, plaintiff_age, case_name FROM plaintiffs JOIN legal_cases ON plaintiffs.case_id = legal_cases.case_id;
SELECT defendant_name, defendant_role, case_name FROM defendants JOIN legal_cases ON defendants.case_id = legal_cases.case_id WHERE defendant_role = 'Accused';
SELECT session_date, location, judge_name FROM court_sessions ORDER BY session_date DESC;
